projects.title: v-share
projects.content:
V-share is a website that allows people to watch youtube videos together. A user can create a lobby, search and play youtube videos within a lobby, users can then join the lobby from other devices and the videos will be insync across devices.

Features

  • Chat Box
  • Video syncing (play, pause, seek)
  • Video Queue
  • Youtube search

Techstack Frontend: React, Redux, MaterialUI, Styled Components Backend: Graphql, AWS, dynamoDb, Youtube API, Twitch API

projects.title: Crypto Summary
projects.content:
Crypto Summary is a android app built using flutter. It is an app for tracking the prices of cryptocurrencies, each coin has its own graph and price information in real time.

Features
  • 200+ crpytocurrencies
  • search bar
  • favourite list
  • Unique color coin themes

Built using flutter, Dart programming language, using coingecko api
